headline: Is PG&E Corporation (PCG) Michael Platt’s Top Pick?
summary: While NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) remains the billionaire’s largest position, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) ranks 2nd on the list of Michael Platt’s top holdings with a 3.41% portfolio share ($148.79 million). We recently published a list of youngest hedge fund billionaires and their top stock picks. On February 5, 2026, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) and SPAN announced a strategic […]
